title: Temporary/short-term car insurance certificates
dataVerified: Driver name, license number, vehicle, coverage dates, insurer, certificate number
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake temporary insurance (common for borrowed cars, test drives, car sharing). Domain binding verifies insurer. Real-time police verification. Very short validity (1-28 days). UK/EU common for occasional drivers. Prevents uninsured borrower fraud.
